The video in question was posted on soci: and has been viewed over 24,000 times and shared over a thousand times.
The video has also been uploaded on the: 3. The video was previously broadcasted by News Nation, News Live, and Prag News channels with the claim of being a video of Bangladeshi immigrants infiltrating the border.
Through reverse: searching on Google and breaking up the video into multiple frames, it was found that the video is not recent and does not pertain to the recent Citizenship Amendment Bill or its possible implications. It was identified as footage from the Milon Mela, a fair organized on the India-Bangladesh border in April and December each year.
